name: Medismo Pharmasoft India
description: Medismo's Pharma CRM software for MR Rep
overview: Medismo’s MR Reporting Online introduces the MR Sales Rep Management System via Online anytime anywhere software and Mobile platform. Online MR reporting software which is repetitive and a constant learning model that will enable pharma companies to identify different market shifts and build response plans in real time before their competitors can gain significant market share.For more details call 99625 78801 to start a dialogue!or drop an email to info@medismo.com.
